entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'otherTargetInterval->registerType == TYP_DOUBLE' during 'LSRA allocate' #108000
  • Be consistent about caching behavior of function resolutions through IDynamicInterfaceCastable #107999
    10.0.0
  • JsonElement.ToString() returns invalid json: "True"/"False" #107998
  • Should stack traces collected in filters have managed EH frames in them? #107995
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill(entireProcessTree: true) doesn't kill entire tree if an intermediate child process is in job object with JOB_OBJECT_LIMIT_KILL_ON_JOB_CLOSE #107992
  • failure in System.Numerics.Tests.op_rightshiftTest.LargeNegativeBigIntegerShiftTest #107990
  • Consider using Linux's getrandom in minipal_get_cryptographically_secure_random_bytes #107989
    Future
  • [WASI] failing System.Net.Sockets tests #107981
    10.0.0
  • [browser] Consider DangerousAddRef for JSObject #107974
    10.0.0
  • Potential memory leak in ep_file_write_event error path #107970
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.TestStreams #107969
  • Serializing source-generated nullable init-only properties throws when using RespectNullableAnnotations #107968
    9.0.0
  • How to handle "The entry point exited without ever building an IHost" #107991
  • [API Proposal]: Add Message property to ExperimentalAttribute #107963
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range) #107962
    10.0.0

Closed

  • .NET Framework DLL can't use at .NET 9 when VB.NET My.Resources Used BinaryFormatter #107967
  • Remove IVT from System.Collections.Immutable #107848
    Future
  • .netframework4.7.2 Problem with webrequest asynchronous request #107835
  • ClientWebSocket ignores ContentType Option #1035
  • Port System.Threading.Tasks docs for .NET 9 APIs #105985
    9.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'block->PrevIs(bPrev)' during 'Optimize control flow' #107920
    9.0.0
  • DSAOpenSsl doest suuport in SslStreamCertificateContext #107977
  • Unable to load library published with PublishAot #107971
    Future
  • [help]NET 8 from Xamarin.Mac, there is a problem writing to NAS. #106448
    Future
  • TensorPrimitives.Exp<double> returns negative infinity instead of 0 for doubles between approximately -709.5 and -709.7 #107838
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Compiled regexes in interpreter ~25-50x regression #99553
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Don't expand virtual calls too early for minopts #108002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Treat -rtm as stable sdk version band #107997
    area-Build-mono, area-Workloads
  • Improve Random{NumberGenerator}.GetItems/String for non-power of 2 choices #107988
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Enable GC double reporting detection #107986
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix SG nullability annotations for required and init properties. #107985
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Remove mono_basic_block_split #107980
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107965
    area-Extensions-Options
  • Add missing params to WhenEach overloads #107964
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Merged

  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix see crefs #107996
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [WASI] ownsPollable parameter to RegisterWasiPollable, downgrade dependencies #107978
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Update configure.h.in #107954
    area-Host
  • Remove InternalsVisibleTo from System.Collections.Immutable. #107872
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • Fix spelling error #107994
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add missing docs for Task API #107951
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Update lexical pointers after compacting blocks in `fgUpdateFlowGraph` #107924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support class target in RUC/RDC code fixers #107956
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Cleanup delegate-related code #107966
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed DBG_DebugBreak stub for missing return instruction. #107973
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [RISC-V] Fixed DBG_DebugBreak stub #107972
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • WebSocket Feedback Follow-up #107662
    area-System.Net
  • Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107886
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Mark the System.Formats.Nrbf assembly as [Experimental] with SYSLIB5005 #107950
    Servicing-approved, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf

Updated

  • [release/9.0-rc2] Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107942
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Extend jump tables #107831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    needs-area-label
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Visit blocks in RPO during LSRA #107927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Implement Vector.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix compilation on ARM64 hosts #107921
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Added JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API and corresponding JsonProperty tests. #107784
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • NativeAOT Thread Name #107943
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Mitigate JsonObject performance regression. #107944
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Implement Enumerable.Reverse(TSource[]) #107957
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] Remove invalid assert in RSAOpenSsl #107952
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Clean up the notes on experimental APIs to simplify for maintenance #107959
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Update configure.h.in #107955
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Added documentation for binding most of the Swift types #2678
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add tracked SSA locals to the first basic block LiveIn set. #2684

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43563
  • dotnet8 <AnalysisLevel> linux #43538
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With NET9 RC2 SDK installed, some strings are unlocalized in output of "dotnet workload --info". #43533
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With NET9 RC2 SDK installed, some strings are unlocalized in output of "dotnet workload search --help". #43528
  • [Epic] Various quality of life issues when running a hackathon experiment #43526

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43561
  • `dotnet workload install` in userlocal mode fails with source-build .NET 9 Preview 5 #41726
  • Self-contained publish regression in .NET 9 RC1 #43461
  • [NETSDKE2E]With 8.0.402 SDK zip installed, Warning: "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 8.0.402-baseline.24467.1 was not found.." happens when installing maui workload. #43537

PullRequests

Created

  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #43560
    Servicing-consider
  • Add runtimeconfig option for DataSet XML serialization #43556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix SelfContained build/publish when FrameworkReference with profile is combined with FrameworkReference without profile #43555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix parsing of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Merged PR 43013: Subtracting 2 for the web template since September w… #43562
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Aspire service tests #43515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix SelfContained build/publish when FrameworkReference with profile is combined with FrameworkReference without profile #43527
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43550
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43516
    Servicing-approved, Area-Tools
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43441
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Correctly handle different architectures for devdeviceID #43471
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Correctly handle different architectures for devdeviceID #43521
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Port to 9.0.1xx: Fix processing non-public classes and generic types in AssemblyScheduler.cs (#43377) #43534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • use prerelease version iteration 1 #43513
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43496
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc2] Patch for Source-Build Stage 2 FSharp FS0064 Warnings #43548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-SourceBuild
  • Do not sync `internal/release/8.0.402` into VMR #43539
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for October #43522
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Hot Reload: Handle file deletions correctly #43368
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2541836 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: also try Basic auth when username is '<token>'. #43354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0002 suggests simplifying generated classes to their base class #75162
  • Stack overflow in ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe #75157
  • Editing Roslyn.sln in VSCode crashes with frequent stack overflows #75155

Closed

  • Collection expressions: invalid code generated for inline array spread element #70708
    17.12
  • Source generators: Decimal argument in attribute parameter results in TypedConstant with null value #75158
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35317.64 #75154

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75156
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Updating to match Gladstone and Editor side changes #75153
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Check for source only properties before tool restore #75161
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Properly iterate through an inline array used as a spread element. #75151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next

Updated

  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix null dereference in GetAssemblyReferenceAlias #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Try latest NuGet #75148
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler to test Gladstone integration #75146
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix the SmartRename button regressions #75134
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Test EnC document diagnostics in non-host workspace #75140
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A lot of time spent in Result execution with eventual exception in kestrel #57953
  • `dotnet watch`: No hot reload changes to apply. #57951
  • The connection was aborted by the application. At HttpRequestStream.ReadAsyncInternal #57950
  • [Identity] Support generating user tokens outside of web applications #57947
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57945
  • Quarantine Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #57944
  • Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App targeting .net 9 runs in production mode when started from VS in debug mode #57941
  • Application DLL cannot be loaded once hosting model is switched OutOfProcess #57949
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server Unable to find service type 'Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescriptions.IDocumentProvider' in dependency injection container. #57939
  • OpenIdConnectProtocolException: IDX21314: OpenIdConnectProtocol requires the jwt token to have an 'aud' claim. #57938
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57937
  • ProblemDetails is not showing the trace id when AddProblemDetails is set before AddControllers #57935

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudGetProductDetails #57928
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #57875
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer Old IdentityModel reference breaks Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens behavior. #57940
  • HttpRequest.BodyReader.ReadAsync stops host from responding under load (from Crank) with body > 5000 bytes #57720
  • JsonPatchDocument `.ApplyTo(...)` raises `JsonPatchException` for unknown Properties instead of transparently mapping them to `JsonExtensionData` #57711
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #57926

PullRequests

Created

  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #57952
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine and fix Http1Connection_RequestEndsWithIncompleteReadAsync #57946
    area-networking
  • Quarantine ServerShutsDownGracefullyWhenMaxRequestBufferSizeExceeded #57943
    area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57942
    area-infrastructure
  • Check for sentinel value when setting HTTP/3 error code #57934
    area-networking

Merged

  • [Templates] Fix template scripts, make them more flexible and robust #57841
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [TEST] Upload windows event logs #57923
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Fix IAsyncEnumerable controller methods to allow setting headers #57924
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Note fire-and-forget status of HubConnection event tasks #57779
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support navigating with URLs for HybridWebView #24821
  • [META] Xcode 16.0 Support for .NET 8/9 and MAUI #24819
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android #24818
    Backlog
  • missing test for x:ClassModifier #24814
    .NET 9 Planning
  • I cannot select API Level 35 for Android. #24813
  • WebViewHandler OnProgressChanged not called on Android when loading/navigating WebView #24812
    Backlog

Closed

  • [iOS] Custom Debug Configuration Issue & Crash #20211
  • Unable to validate .IPA file because of AppIcon missed #24796
  • Cannot build .NET Maui app from vs code on mac following macOS 15.0 update #24816
  • +[IMKClient subclass]: chose IMKClient_Legacy +[IMKInputSession subclass]: chose IMKInputSession_Legacy macOS 15.0 #24794
  • Can't "Pair to Mac" > Problem with Xamarin Website? #24809
  • Add FontScale property to IFontElement #24800

PullRequests

Created

  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 (take 3) #24822
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Adds a rendering performance test #24762
    area-layout, area-testing, community ✨
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage Title property #24781
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow multiple EntityTypeConfigurationAttribute for entity types #34710
  • Build a better way to manage custom migration operations #34708
  • Required dependent of optional dependent is not materialized/updated properly #34707
  • Error querying on complex type whose container is mapped to a table and a view #34706
    Backlog
  • The type initializer for 'Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection' threw an exception. #34704
  • Query translate bug using compat level 120 #34703

Closed

  • Memory growth on Linux with "journal_mode=memory" #34695
  • EF Core 9 Native AOT #34705

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove package source mapping and suppress warning #34711
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode
  • Handle view mapping in ExecuteDelete/Update translation #34709

Merged

  • Add all precompiled query tests to the same collection. #34692

Updated

  • Allow using foreign keys in Dataverse reverse engineering #34689
  • Optimize DISTINCT over collections of 0 or 1 element #34702

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [internal/8.0.1xx] Installer CI builds failing to find System.Diagnostics.EventLog with version (>= 8.0.1) #20142
